metadata.title: CVE-2021-34363 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The thefuck (aka The Fuck) package before 3.31 for Python allows PathTraversal that leads to arbitrary file deletion via the "undo archiveoperation" feature.

criterions.comment: thefuck: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
